title: Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 408 of 2020))
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Housing (Regulation of Approved
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Housing (Regulation of Approved 

Housing Bodies) Act 2019 (Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited housing (regulation approved housing bodies) act 2019 (commencement) order 2022

title: Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 408 of 2020))
heading: 2. The 1st day of July 2022 is appointed as the day on which the Housing
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of July 2022 is appointed as the day on which the Housing 
(Regulation of Approved Housing Bodies) Act 2019 (No. 47 of 2019) shall, 
insofar as it is not already in operation, come into operation. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 1st July, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [307] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 July, 2022. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [307] 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH
